00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_ODECOLLISIONDETECTOR_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_ODECOLLISIONDETECTOR_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 
00030 #include <base/array>
00031 #include <physics/CollisionDetector>
00032 #include <physics/ODECollidableBody>
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace physics {
00036 
00037 /**
00038  * Collision detector that wraps the ODE physics library collision functionality
00039  */
00040 class ODECollisionDetector : public CollisionDetector
00041 {
00042 public:
00043   ODECollisionDetector();
00044   virtual ~ODECollisionDetector();
00045 
00046   virtual String className() const { return String("ODECollisionDetector"); }
00047 
00048   virtual ref<CollidableBody> createCollidableBody(ref<Shape> shape); ///< new CollidableBody with specified Shape
00049   
00050   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable1, ref<const Collidable> collidable2);
00051   
00052   virtual void collide(ref<const Collidable> collidable) { Collider::collide(collidable); }
00053 
00054   
00055 protected:
00056   virtual ref<CollisionState> newCollisionState(ref<const CollidableBody> collidable1, ref<const CollidableBody> collidable2) const;
00057 
00058   
00059   class ODECollisionState : public CollisionState
00060   {
00061   public:
00062     ODECollisionState(ref<const CollidableBody> collidable1, ref<const CollidableBody> collidable2);
00063     virtual ~ODECollisionState();
00064 
00065     //Vector3 v;
00066     //ref<const Polyhedron::Vertex> lastSupport[2]; // remember the last support vertex
00067 
00068     virtual String className() const { return String("ODECollisionState"); }
00069   };
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 
00074 } // physics
